segments.text: My attention is drawn to the kids over by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're up to something, that's for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is teetering on a small, wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching way up into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, there's a cookie jar in there, labeled quite clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand right inside, probably grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing below, arm outstretched, ready for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, I'm genuinely worried it will tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One leg seems splayed out, it's just a matter of time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mischievous pair, sneaking cookies like this!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really should be more careful, it's so high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and break that plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret operation is quite elaborate for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR
